item.title: Public Preview: Azure Event Hubs offers new portal capabilities, and 100% Kafka compatibility
item.description: New portal experience simplifies testing and debugging. Kafka compatibility enables seamless integration with Apache Kafka workloads.

item.title: Retirement: Azure CDN Standard/Premium from Edgio (formerly Verizon) will be retired
item.description: Retirement notice: Azure CDN Standard/Premium from Edgio (formerly Verizon) will be retired on November 4, 2025

item.title: Generally Available: Convert to Azure Premium SSD v2 disks
item.description: Converting to Azure Premium SSD v2 (Pv2) feature allows you to change your existing Standard SSD, Standard HDD, or Premium SSD v1 disks to Pv2 disks in a few clicks with minimal downtime. This process avoids disk destruction, eliminates the need to use snapshots as a staging resource, and doesn’t require waiting for background data copying.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure File Sync support for managed identities
item.description: Azure File Sync now supports managed identities, eliminating shared keys for authentication. This feature, in public preview, is available at no extra cost in all Azure Public and Gov regions.

item.title: Retirement: Azure Health Data Services will be retired on October 31, 2025 in the Qatar Central region
item.description: Important: Azure Health Data Services in the Qatar Central region will be retired on October 31, 2025.

item.title: Public Preview: Confidential Containers now in preview on Azure Red Hat OpenShift
item.description: Enhance cloud security with Confidential Containers on Azure Red Hat OpenShift, protecting sensitive workloads using hardware-level encryption and isolation.

item.title: Generally Available: Enhancements on Elastic SAN on resiliency, security, scalability, and integration with Azure VMWare Solution
item.description: Azure Elastic SAN has released new features around improving data integrity, simplifying the management experience of a SAN, improving cost-effectiveness for AVS, and published a Service Level Agreement (SLA).

item.title: Public Preview: PostgreSQL 17 on Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server

item.description: Override Azure Load Balancer’s health probe behavior on a per backend pool instance basis using Load Balancer Admin State feature to make taking your VM out of rotation for maintenance easy.

item.title: Public Preview: Edit network features for Azure NetApp Files with no downtime

item.title: Public Preview: API Management & API Center Synchronization

item.description: You can now backup VMs using Premium SSDv2 and Ultra Disk with Azure Backup to GRS vaults to guard against disasters in the primary region. You can also enable cross-region to restore to test restored on-demand in the secondary region.

item.description: Azure Elastic SAN is now generally available as a VMware Certified datastore for Azure VMware Solution (AVS). Elastic SAN offers the cheapest per GiB storage for AVS, so you can optimize your storage and lower your costs.

These VMs are ideal for demanding GPU-accelerated graphics applications, cloud-based virtual desktops, high-quality gaming experiences, and small to medium AI/ML inference workloads

This VM series provides higher throughput, lower latency, and access to modern codecs like AV1, making it an ideal choice for video transcoding on the cloud.
